title: cleaning up your credit report
extract: To clean up your credit report, you'll need to order copies of your report from the three major credit bureaus (also called credit reporting agencies), review the reports for inaccuracies or old information, and then ask the credit bureaus to correct the information.
extract_html: To clean up your credit report, you'll need to order copies of your report from the three major credit bureaus (also called credit reporting agencies), review the reports for inaccuracies or old information, and then ask the credit bureaus to correct the information.
